report.name: ppcm_listtel

dataSource.name: Q_LISTEL
dataSource.select:
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, res.rtel tel, imm.iadrabr immeuble, substr(TO_CHAR(st.codsg, 'FM0000000'),0,5) code, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','',sit.soccode) societe from situ_ress_full sit, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm and sit.ident=res.ident and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' -- and sit.codsg like '161612%' &P_WHERE
order by 2,3,code;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sit.prestation , 'STA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'INT' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'GRA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 1 , 0 ) ) ) )

dataSource.name: Q_LISTEL_GROUPE
dataSource.select:
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole_g, res.rnom nom_g, res.rprenom prenom_g, res.rtel tel_g, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, st.gnom responsable_g, imm.iadrabr immeuble_g, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO_g, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','',sit.soccode) societe_g from situ_ress_full sit, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm and sit.ident=res.ident and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' -- and sit.codsg like '161612%' &P_WHERE
order by 2,3,code_g;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sit.prestation , 'STA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'INT' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'GRA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 1 , 0 ) ) ) )

dataSource.name: Q_DEP
dataSource.select:
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_dep(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,3)) libdep, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, res.rtel tel, imm.iadrabr immeuble, substr(TO_CHAR(st.codsg, 'FM0000000'),0,3) code, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','',sit.soccode) societe from situ_ress_full sit, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm and sit.ident=res.ident and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' -- and sit.codsg like '161612%' &P_WHERE
order by 2,3,code;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sit.prestation , 'STA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'INT' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'GRA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 1 , 0 ) ) ) )
